activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11809
activity.text:
when navigating from `/org/:orgId/facilities `to `/facility/:facilityId/settings/general`, we can pass the `orgId` along with the navigation. To persist this orgId while moving across different pages within the facility section, we can wrap the entire facility layout or route in a FacilityNavigationProvider using useContext. This allows us to retain the orgId as long as we are within the facility context, and use it when we delete a facility to navigate back to the organization's facility list.
is this spproach correct? @rithviknishad

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11809
activity.text:
@rithviknishad so when a user deletes a facility, instead of going back to the dashboard, we can use something like `useHistory,` or `navigate(-1)`, which will take the user to the previous page, i.e., the facility list of the organization. 
The delete will happen same as before.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11381
activity.text:
@nihal467 Can i work on this issue?
**Estimated Time:** 1 Day
Approach: 
- In `UserForm.tsx` the password and c_password fields must be kept optional at first. 
- Only when the user enters a value in password, both fields become mandatory.
- If value is removed from password, both revert back to being optional.
- Necessary schema changes have to be made and the fields must be optional/mandatory dynamically.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11012
activity.text:
**Approach:**
Changes must be made in the `OrganizationUsers.tsx` component
There can be two solutions to this:
1. Breaking the name to the next line, i.e, wrapping the long words
2. Truncate the long names with ellipsis (...)

One more approach could be to truncate the name with ellipsis normally, and show the full name with wrapping on hover.

**End Date:** By end of tomorrow (07/03/25) or 1-2 Days after being assigned

@Jacobjeevan I would like to work on this issue, please assign it to me
